## ILegendConfig interface

Configures the legend of the chart.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ILegendConfig 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [font?](./chart-def.ilegendconfig.font.md) | [IFontConfig](./chart-def.ifontconfig.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Configure the font in the legend. |
|  [show](./chart-def.ilegendconfig.show.md) | boolean | Set to true (default) to show the legend for the chart . |
